org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

接口 BlobService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BlobCache, BlobServer

    public interface BlobService
    A simple store and retrieve binary large objects (BLOBs).

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      BlobClient createClient() 
      void delete(BlobKey key)
      This method deletes the file associated with the provided blob key.
      int getPort()
      Returns the port of the blob service.
      URL getURL(BlobKey key)
      This method returns the URL of the file associated with the provided blob key.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown method which is called to terminate the blob service.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getURL

        URL getURL(BlobKey key)
    throws IOException
        This method returns the URL of the file associated with the provided blob key.
        参数:
        key - blob key associated with the requested file
        返回:
        The URL to the file.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • delete

        void delete(BlobKey key)
     throws IOException
        This method deletes the file associated with the provided blob key.
        参数:
        key - associated with the file to be deleted
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Returns the port of the blob service.
        返回:
        the port of the blob service.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown method which is called to terminate the blob service.

      • createClient

        BlobClient createClient()
                 throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException
